sourceMeaningMnemonic: The <radical>original</radical> <radical>geoduck</radical> had a <kanji>request</kanji>. He wants there to be more geoducks in the world!
meaningInfo: Remember, this is the OG = original geoduck. There are no other geoducks yet.
readingMnemonic: The only person that would even hear the geoduck's <kanji>request</kanji> was <reading>Gan</reading>dhi (<ja>がん</ja>). Gandhi closed his eyes, sat down, and spread the geoduck's request to the rest of the world.
readingInfo:
People listened when Gandhi said, "My friends. We must stop trying to eat the geoduck, and instead allow it to breed. Join me in this fast!"

And that's why we have so many geoducks on the earth today. Thanks Gandhi.
